description:
Recent Updates Include:
**Variable Radar Image Opacity
** Current (most recent per NOAA metar) weather conditions for map center in collapsible pane. Updates whenever you move the map.
** Hi Contrast is now the default map.
** Current map time and current system time displayed. (shows how old the map is). Tapping the 'time box' will reload the current map.
** Cleaned up possible memory leak.
** Road Map loads better.
** App will display in FULL SCREEN mode on the TouchPad.
**  When no GPS signal present on startup, defaults to last recently viewed rad site.

"WeatherMaps Radar welcomes the TouchPad"
 introductory pricing of only $1.99**

WeatherMaps - Radar, the most advanced dedicated radar app for the Pre's, Veer, Pixi & TouchPad, shows the most current Doppler weather radar image for your location on a google map.  Once WeatherMaps displays the current radar image, simply 'drag' the map in any direction and once you stop dragging, the app will determine if there's a closer nexrad radar site to the new map center, and display that image.  A great way to see if that rain at the edge of your current radar is a huge storm heading your way.  Map is zoomable down to street level.  Touching the bottom bar will bring up the list of radar images that are available:
**Base Reflectivity 
**Composite Reflectivity 
**Storm Relative Velocity (under development)
**Storm Base Velocity (under development)
**1 hr Total Rainfall 
**Storm Total Rainfall 
**Vertically Integrated Liquid
**Echo Tops 

Scheduled Updates:
-Pinch to zoom.
-Looping radar images (up to 20 images).

$1.99 intro pricing will only last for a limited time. There will be additional location based weather apps in the near future. Please email me at dave@jancoapps.com with any questions, comments or bugs issues you may have before leaving an app review. I'm committed to keeping this the best weather radar app in the catalog.
